video.title: Battlestar Galactica (1978)
video.synopsis: A caravan of 220 space vehicles sets off in search of a new and peaceful frontier, a place where humankind can safely flourish and grow.

episodes.synopsis: Betrayal and slaughter destroy the human Twelve Colonies's peace accord with the Cylons. The survivors go into space in search of a new home: Earth.
episodes.title: Saga of a Star World: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: At the direction of Sire Uri, the fleet lands at a station on Carillon. Apollo and Starbuck investigate the planet's seemingly benign nature.
episodes.title: Saga of a Star World: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Against Adama's better judgment, the Galactica crew enjoys the nightlife of the casinos and nightclubs on Carillon, a place that holds a dark secret.
episodes.title: Saga of a Star World: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: While on a routine patrol, Apollo and Starbuck encounter a void in space. Meanwhile, a mysterious illness befalls most of the Galactica's pilots.
episodes.title: The Lost Planet of Gods: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Commander Adama sends the Galactica into the mysterious void, believing it's the way to the planet Kobol, the fabled origin of the Twelve Colonies.
episodes.title: The Lost Planet of Gods: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Shot down by Cylon fighters, Apollo crashes on the planet Equellus, where he's found by a widow named Vella and learns a Cylon named Red-Eye is there.
episodes.title: The Lost Warrior

episodes.synopsis: Starbuck is recruited to test an experimental -- and unarmed -- Viper prototype, which features an onboard computer with a mind of its own.
episodes.title: The Long Patrol

episodes.synopsis: Baltar succeeds in luring the fleet into the path of Aracta, a frozen wasteland of a planet that's home to a devastating Cylon pulsar cannon.
episodes.title: The Gun on Ice Planet Zero: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While trying to disable the pulsar cannon on Aracta, Apollo and Starbuck face a near-mutiny by the convicts sent to help them.
episodes.title: The Gun on Ice Planet Zero: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a Cylon raid destroys most of the fleet's food supply, the Galactica  crew eyes the wealthy planet of Sectar. But the Sectarians can't help.
episodes.title: The Magnificent Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Starbuck crashes on Attila, where most of the civilization has been wiped out by Cylons. He becomes the pawn in a trade for one boy's father.
episodes.title: The Young Lords

episodes.synopsis: The Galactica discovers the battlestar, Pegasus, which had been thought to be destroyed. But the ship's commander causes a rift within both crews.
episodes.title: The Living Legend: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After Adama agrees to join Commander Cain in a joint attack on the Cylon base, Apollo and Starbuck set out to destroy a planetary defense system.
episodes.title: The Living Legend: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Cylon suicide attacks cripple the Galactica. As a result, Starbuck and Apollo must undertake a perilous mission to rescue crew members from the fire.
episodes.title: Fire in Space

episodes.synopsis: The Galactica encounters a cosmic phenomenon just as several Viper pilots vanish on patrol. Meanwhile, the crew finds a wrecked ship.
episodes.title: War of the Gods: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The enigmatic Count Iblis delivers Baltar to the Galactica, impressing the council and coming one step closer to controlling the fleet.
episodes.title: War of the Gods: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: An elderly man named Chameleon has Starbuck convinced he's his long-lost father. But Starbuck's the only one who doesn't see the connection.
episodes.title: The Man with Nine Lives

episodes.synopsis: A scuffle breaks out between Starbuck and a competitor during a game of triad on the Rising Star, and both men are ejected.
episodes.title: Murder on the Rising Star

episodes.synopsis: The Galactica encounters a ship that's occupied by two adults and four children in suspended animation. And the sleepers could be from Earth.
episodes.title: Greetings from Earth: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Apollo, Starbuck and Cassiopeia escort the shuttle and its now-awakened passengers to the agricultural world of Paradeen.
episodes.title: Greetings from Earth: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The council votes to dissolve martial law in light of recent treaties. But when Baltar escapes, he takes the council hostage.
episodes.title: Baltar's Escape

episodes.synopsis: The mysterious globes of light return, whisking Apollo to the planet Terra. In human form, a light reveals that a holocaust will soon befall Terra.
episodes.title: Experiment in Terra

episodes.synopsis: Starbuck encounters an old flame, Aurora, and returns with her to her ship, the Celestra. Once there, they discover a mutiny in progress.
episodes.title: Take the Celestra

episodes.synopsis: The Galactica receives a signal that's coming from Earth, but Adama fears Cylon interference. Adama leads an offensive against Cylon basestars.
episodes.title: The Hand of God
